metadata.synopsis: The player enters the camp and finds a painting with the severed head of Zevlor attached.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *It is the smell that strikes you first. Spiced ceremonial oils, cut through with the copper tang of blood.*
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player approaching camp - stops, quizzical
